title: Apple iPad Pro deals: Save on the Apple devices at Amazon
title_page: Apple iPad Pro deals: Save on the Apple devices at Amazon - CNN
maintext:
The new iPad Pro has barely been out for a week, but that isn't stopping Amazon from dropping its price. And actually, Amazon is discounting the 2018 iPad Pro, too, so you have options when it comes to purchasing a new on-sale iPad.
Both the 11- and 12.9-inch 2020 iPad Pro are marked right now. The 128GB 12.9-inch iPad Pro just a few dollars off at $996.99, while the price on the 128GB 11-inch model has been slightly reduced from its $799.99 starting price to $793.45. There are also some discounts to be had if you want more storage. Here's the breakdown:
128GB 11-inch iPad Pro ($793.45, originally $799.99; amazon.com )
256GB 11-inch iPad Pro ($849.99, originally $899.99; amazon.com )
512GB 11-inch iPad Pro ($1,047.43, originally $1,099.99; amazon.com )
128GB 12.9-inch iPad Pro ($996.99, originally $999.99; amazon.com )
256GB 12.9-inch iPad Pro ($1,051.92, originally $1,099.99; amazon.com )
512GB 12.9-inch iPad Pro ($1,294, originally $1,299.99; amazon.com)
The 2020 models include a faster processor and an improved rear camera with a LiDAR sensor for an premiere augmented reality experience. And while the new camera setup is neat, and the new processor makes it the fastest iPad Pro we've tested, that's where the differences between the two models end.
The 2018 iPad Pro is still fast, runs the latest version of iPadOS — it will even work with the upcoming Magic Keyboard for iPad that adds a trackpad — and has a respectable rear-facing camera setup. Sure, you miss out on some speed and a fancy-sounding LiDAR system, but if you never use your iPad's camera, then it doesn't really matter.
For the 2018 model, we're seeing discounts on all storage allotments:
64GB 11-inch 2018 iPad Pro ($674, originally $799; amazon.com )
512GB 11-inch 2018 iPad Pro ($999.99, originally $1,149; amazon.com )
1TB 11-inch 2018 iPad Pro ($1,199.99, originally $1,349; amazon.com )
64GB 12.9-inch 2918 iPad Pro ($899.99, originally $999.99; amazon.com )
256GB 12.9-inch 2018 iPad Pro ($999.99, originally $1,149.99; amazon.com )
512GB 12.9-inch iPad Pro ($1,294, originally $1,299.99; amazon.com)
And if you want an iPad Pro with Wi-Fi and cellular connectivity, discounts are available on that, too. A 2018 12.9-inch iPad Pro with 64GB of storage and cellular connectivity is $1,049.98, down from $1,149. Or you can find the 11-inch 2018 iPad Pro with 256GB of storage and cellular for $949.99, marked down from its regular price of $1,099.
64GB 12.9-inch 2018 iPad Pro with cellular ($1,049.98, originally $1,149; amazon.com )
256GB 11-inch 2018 iPad Pro with cellular ($949.99, originally $1,099; amazon.com)
So, if you don't care about having the latest and fastest device available, the 2018 iPad Pro will suit you just fine — and it'll save you even more money. But if you plan on using an iPad Pro for years to come, it makes sense to spend a little extra cash on the 2020 version. For more great Apple deals, check out CNN Coupons.
Note: The prices above reflect the retailer's listed price at the time of publication.
